name: SkyJumper (Larsi_official)
description:
Instructions:

- Play on Fullscreen mode
- Move with [A] and [D]
- Jump with [SPACE]

Please leave a comment and tell me what you think.

SkyJumper is a project developed specifically for the "ZenoJam-6". 

It's a simple endless platformer in which you take control of an astronaut bird to jump to infinite heights.

The game has a high score system.

All graphical assets were created by myself.

Other assets:

Background music: 
https://pixabay.com/de/music/ | Title: "A Bird" | Creator: nojisuma

Jumping Sound: 
Asset: FREE Casual Game SFX Pack | Sound: DM-CGS-07 | Creator: Dustyroom | Link: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/free-casual-game-sfx-pack-5...
